inclusion.criterion: Received stable hemodialysis at least 3 months.
inclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: patients with severe infections, severe heart disease and liver disease, malignancy,
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: autoimmune disorders, severe malnutrition, or clinical conditions requiring oral nutrition supplements;
exclusion.label: unknown

exclusion.criterion: Pregnancy or wishing/trying to get pregnant
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has Wegener's granulomatosis and is being treated with corticosteroid and cyclophosphamides. His Birmingham Vasculitis Activity Score (BVAS) is above 4.
